name: Sakura Wars 3
description:
Sakura Wars 3 is an adventure-strategy game developed by Red Entertainment and Overworks. It was originally released in 2003. It was published by SEGA. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Sakura Wars 3 on PC.
Ryutaro Nonaka produced the game. It was directed by Akira Nishino. It was scored by Kohei Tanaka and Kōhei Tanaka.
